about:
I spend my time balancing my left brain with my right. I think my greatest strength lies in balancing my aptitude for creativity with my technical skills to create products users love. I started out as a software engineer, made an abrupt shift to product management, and have slowly drifted back to somewhere in the middle where I try to bridge the gap between the two domains.

I am passionate about why people do what they do, and believe in making data-driven decisions to create products that solve real problems. I think Steve Jobs had it right when he said we should "make products we are proud to sell and recommend to our family and friends." Today, I am fortunate to be leading an incredible team at The Ashley Group where we do just that for our clients every single day.
